name: Firefoperax
description:
Firefox theme for those who like the new Opera design, but still loving the Fox <3

A lot of work to do, but it's working for now...
I'm waiting for your feedback ;)
additional_info:
Compatible Firefox 50+

Before installing, you need :
- Switch to the Light Compact installed Firefox theme
- Stylish (lolz) [https://addons.mozilla.org/fr/firefox/addon/stylish/]
- url-addon-bar [https://addons.mozilla.org/fr/firefox/addon/url-addon-bar/]
- Vertical Toolbar [https://addons.mozilla.org/fr/firefox/addon/vertical-toolbar/]


Thanks to:

LouCypher for Hamburger/Menu icon to Left
https://userstyles.org/styles/94907/australis-menu-button-on-the-left

kawasaki_ichiro for Hamburger/Menu icon look like icon
https://userstyles.org/styles/138273/changing-menu-button-to-browser-logo-or-others


To-do list:
- Remove vertical bar icon hover (berk)

Version 0.2 :
- Wallpaper for new tab
- Loading icon is now dark (like safari maybe?)
- Browser panel is now bigger (like Opera)
